description.gold-silver:
May cause the foe
to fall asleep.
description.crystal:
May cause the foe
to fall asleep.
description.ruby-sapphire:
Demands a kiss with a scary
face that induces sleep.
description.emerald:
Demands a kiss with a scary
face that induces sleep.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The user forces a
kiss on the foe
with a scary face
that induces sleep.
description.diamond-pearl:
With a scary face,
the user forces a
kiss on the foe.
It may make the
target fall asleep.
description.platinum:
With a scary face,
the user forces a
kiss on the foe.
It may make the
target fall asleep.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
With a scary face, the
user tries to force a
kiss on the foe. If it
succeeds, the target
falls asleep.
description.black-white:
With a scary face, the user tries to
force a kiss on the target. If it
succeeds, the target falls asleep.

With a scary face, the user tries to
force a kiss on the target. If it
succeeds, the target falls asleep.

With a scary face, the user tries to
force a kiss on the target. If it
succeeds, the target falls asleep.
